widget.name: remote_reports
widget.label: Use remote logging
widget.caption: Archive reports in a remote database
widget.description:
Enable this if you want to archive the content filter reports in a remote database
Download the script to create the database schema: webfilter_mysql.sql

Create a user with all privileges grated on Web Filter database. Example: GRANT ALL PRIVILEGES ON webfilter.* TO 'user'@'%';

If you have just upgraded BluePex Web Filter package, then you may need to run the database upgrade script: webfilter_mysql_upgrade.sql

widget.name: log_referer
widget.label: Save reference of urls
widget.caption: Save the reference of urls on the database
widget.description:
Enable webfitler to save the reference of urls on database.
This logs are for the objects loaded on the web page accessed by the user.
The principal url still will be saved on the database.
